mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m WHERE m.status = 1 AND m.type IN (1, 2) AND ( m.path = '/dashboard' OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE rm.menu_id = m.id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_menu child_menu LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON child_menu.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE child_menu.parent_id = m.id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_menu child_menu LEFT JOIN sys_menu grandchild_menu ON child_menu.id = grandchild_menu.parent_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON grandchild_menu.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE child_menu.parent_id = m.id AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ) ) ORDER BY m.sort ASC
SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_menu ORDER BY parent_id ASC, sort ASC
